40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin 'Amr:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Indeed Allah, the Blessed and Exalted, created His creation in darkness, then He cast His Light upon them, so whoever is touched by that light he is guided, and whoever is not, he goes astray. It is for this reason that I say that the pens have dried with Allah's knowledge

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي افْتِرَاقِ هَذِهِ الأُمَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Splitting That Will Occur In This Ummah
